long_description: REI Airflyte Distance shorts will have you shooting for a personal best during long training runs. Quick-drying and lightweight fabric delivers 4-way stretch and a soft feel against skin. The waistband of the Airflyte Distance shorts holds 2 gels via loops in the front and 2 gels in back via drop-in pockets (gel packets not included). Rear zippered pocket stores essentials such as a key or I.D. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Stretchy polyester crepe liner briefs wick moisture away from body to keep you comfortable. Elastic waistband with drawcord fine-tunes the fit. Reflective highlights increase your visibility in dim light. The REI Airflyte Distance running shorts offer an active fit that allows a full range of motion.
short_description: REI Airflyte Distance shorts will have you shooting for a personal best during long training runs. Quick-drying and lightweight fabric delivers 4-way stretch and a soft feel against skin.
